plot: The first of four 'Bujang Lapok' (Unwanted Bachelor) movies, this movie chronicles the loves and lives of three bachelors living in '50s Singapore.
title: Bujang lapok
plot_es: The first of four 'Bujang Lapok' (Unwanted Bachelor) movies, this movie chronicles the loves and lives of three bachelors living in '50s Singapore.
plot_en: The first of four 'Bujang Lapok' (Unwanted Bachelor) movies, this movie chronicles the loves and lives of three bachelors living in '50s Singapore.
